sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../partials/Header'; import PageIllustration from '../partials/PageIllustration'; import Dropdown from '../utils/Dropdown'; class InputForm extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { firstname: "", lastname: "", email: "", full_address: "", city: "", state: "", zip: "", country: "", dob: "", age: "", phone_num: "", cc_last4: "", device_ad_id: "", twitter_handle: "", usrchoice: "" }; this.handleInputChange = this.handleInputChange.bind(this); } handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:5000/privacyAPI/v1/', this.state) .then(function (response) { console.log(response); }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); }); this.props.history.push('/about'); } handleInputChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault() this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } render() { const { firstname, lastname, mail, full_address, city, state, zip, country, email, dob, age, phone_num, cc_last4, device_ad_id, twitter_handle, usrchoice } = this.state return (
{/* Site header */}
{/* Page content */}
{/* Page illustration */}
{/* Page header */}

Fill in the required data fields

{/*
*/}
Why do I need to enter this info?
{/* Form */} {/*
*/}
{/* firstname */}
{/* lastname */}
{/* email */}
{/* full_address */}
{/* */}

  • 32% of companies on our list need your street address. They likely use it in compiling location or socioeconomic data.

{/* city */}

  • 37% of companies on our list need your city of residence. They likely use it in compiling location or socioeconomic data.
{/* */}
{/* state */}
{/* zip */}

  • 36% of companies on our list need your zip code. They likely use it in compiling location or socioeconomic data.
{/* */}
{/* country */}

  • 72% of companies on our list need your country of residence. They likely use it in compiling location or socioeconomic data.
{/* */}
{/* dob */}

  • 7% of companies on our list need your date of birth. They likely use it in verifying identity for people searchers.
{/* */}
{/* age */}

  • 4% of companies on our list need your age. They likely use it in verifying identity for people searchers.
{/* */}
{/* phone_num */}

  • 20% of companies on our list need your phone number. They likely use it in verifying identity or selling phone data.
{/* */}
{/* cc_last4 */}

  • 0.5% of companies on our list need the last 4 digits of your credit card number. They likely use it to cross-reference with credit agencies.
{/* */}
{/* device_ad_id */}
{/* twitter_handle */}

  • 0.2% of companies on our list need your twitter handle. They likely sell it in combination with other mobile phone data or to use as identity verification.
{/* */}
{/* Subset Selection */}

Select the companies you want to delete from

{/*
Select at least one
*/}
{/* Most Bang for Buck */}
Reccommended
Most Bang For Your Buck
{/* {45} */} {/* {priceOutput.plan1[value][1]} */} {/* {priceOutput.plan1[value][2]} */}
This is our recommended option for people looking to get started.
This includes:
  • 19 of the largest data brokers and people search sites
  • spokeo, radaris, whitepages, intelius, beenverified, acxiom, infotracer, lexisnexis
  • + 56 additional services which require minimal followup from you
  • For a full list of services supported in this option, click here
{/*
*/}
{/* Start free trial */} {/* */} Select
{/* + All People Searches */}
All People Search Services
{/* {priceOutput.plan2[value][0]} */} {/* {priceOutput.plan2[value][1]} */} {/* {priceOutput.plan2[value][2]} */}
This selection includes all services in the most bang for buck option and all additional people search services.
All services in most bang for buck plus:
  • 100 placeholder text commonly
  • Consectetur adipiscing elit
  • Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat
  • Officia deserunt mollit anim
  • Placeholder text commonly used
{/*
*/}
{/* Start free trial */} {/* */} Select
{/* All services*/}
All Companies On Our List
{/* {priceOutput.plan3[value][0]} */} {/* {priceOutput.plan3[value][1]} */} {/* {priceOutput.plan3[value][2]} */}
This sends deletion requests to each of 500+ data brokers, the most exhaustive list currently available. This option is for the serious privacy enthusiasts.
All features of Essential plus:
  • WARNING This will start 500+ email threads.
  • Consectetur adipiscing elit
  • Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat
  • Officia deserunt mollit anim
  • Placeholder text commonly used
{/*
*/}
{/* */} {/* */} Select {/* Start free trial */} {/* Start free trial */}
{/* Check Boxes */} {/*

  • This selection includes only the 20 largest people search sites and data brokers.

  • Remove your data from companies that scrape public government records and sell it to other people or companies who want information on you specifically.

  • This is a list of 500+ data brokers, which may require a significant amount of follow up.
*/} {/* button */} {/*
*/}
This is run entirely locally, we don't have access to this data. But here's our Privacy Policy anyway.
); } } export default withRouter(InputForm); // export default InputForm;
